content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Wolf Pack, the April 26, 1948, broadcast of Let George Do It.

(30:10) Our second story is The Holstedter Case from The Line-Up. That story aired December 21, 1950.

Download CaseClosed815

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to donate, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you.
